name: Crime Revolt
description:
Like gun games and first person shooters? Exciting and fun multiplayer is awaiting you!
Download Crime Revolt and meet lots of weapons, game maps and even zombie mode!

Customize your character with your favorite weapons and show who is the rating’s leader.
6 tactical maps and 3 battle modes is enough to make fun and improve your battle tactics. Simple controls will help you with that.
Complete your daily contracts and gain big rewards. Upgrade your weapons and wears to look like a real militant.

We recommend to play on such devices: iPhone 4S, iPhone 6+/6/5/5s/5c and iPad 2/3/4/Air/Mini/Mini Retina and higher.
Attention: the game requires Internet connection.
